TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WebServiceBindingAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class WebServiceBindingAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class WebServiceBindingAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: Declares a binding that defines one or more XML Web service methods.

span.span: Declares a binding that defines one or more XML Web service methods.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个绑定，定义的 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL)，是类似于一个接口，它定义一组具体的操作。A binding, as defined by Web Services Description Language (WSDL), is similar to an interface, in that it defines a concrete set of operations. 每个 XML Web 服务方法是特定的绑定中的某个操作。Each XML Web service method is an operation within a particular binding. XML Web 服务方法是 XML Web 服务的默认绑定或绑定中指定的成员应用于实现 XML Web 服务的类。XML Web service methods are members of either the default binding for an XML Web service or a binding specified within a applied to a class implementing an XML Web service. XML Web 服务可以实现多个绑定，通过应用多个属性到 XML Web 服务。An XML Web service can implement multiple bindings, by applying multiple attributes to an XML Web service. 一次一个或多个特性应用于 XML Web 服务或可应用于单个 XML Web 服务方法，以指示由特定的 XML Web 服务方法实现的绑定操作。Once one or more attributes are applied to an XML Web service, a or can be applied to individual XML Web service methods to indicate the binding operation implemented by a particular XML Web service method. 设置的属性或以指定的绑定 XML Web 服务方法实现操作。Set the property of or to specify the binding an XML Web service method is implementing an operation for. ## Examples 下面的 XML Web 服务实现从四个绑定的操作。The following XML Web service implements operations from four bindings. 具体而言，XML Web 服务声明其实现操作，通过将三个应用的三个绑定属性到 XML Web 服务。Specifically, the XML Web service declares three bindings it implements operations for, by applying three attributes to the XML Web service. 若要指定的绑定 XML Web 服务方法实现操作，应用于每个 XML Web 服务方法中，除`DefaultBindingMethod`。To specify which binding an XML Web service method is implementing an operation for, a is applied to each of the XML Web service methods, except `DefaultBindingMethod`. 未指定的绑定`DefaultBindingMethod`，它正在实现 XML Web 服务的默认绑定上的操作。By not specifying a binding for `DefaultBindingMethod`, it is implementing an operation on the default binding for the XML Web service. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic WebServiceBindingAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebServiceBindingAttribute Example/CS/sourcecs.asmx)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic WebServiceBindingAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebServiceBindingAttribute Example/VB/sourcevb.asmx)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数用于指定 XML Web 服务会应用到，并且属于默认命名空间中定义的绑定的名称。This constructor is used to specify a name for a binding defined in the XML Web service it is applied to and is a member of the default namespace. ## Examples 下面的示例指定名为的绑定`LocalBinding`中定义`BindingSample`XML Web 服务。The following example specifies a binding named `LocalBinding` that is defined in the `BindingSample` XML Web service. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数用于指定 XML Web 服务会应用到的是提供的命名空间的成员中定义的绑定的名称。This constructor is used to specify a name for a binding defined in the XML Web service it is applied to that and is a member of the supplied namespace. ## Examples 下面的示例指定名为的绑定`LocalBindingNonDefaultNamespace`的成员`http://www.contoso.com/MyBinding`命名空间中定义和`BindingSample`XML Web 服务。The following example specifies a binding named `LocalBindingNonDefaultNamespace` that is a member of the `http://www.contoso.com/MyBinding` namespace and defined in the `BindingSample` XML Web service. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数用于指定 XML Web 服务会应用到的是提供的命名空间的成员中未定义的绑定的名称。This constructor is used to specify a name for a binding not defined in the XML Web service it is applied to that and is a member of the supplied namespace. ## Examples 下面的示例指定名为的绑定`RemoteBinding`的成员`http://www.contoso.com/MyBinding`命名空间和在定义`http://www.contoso.com/MyService.asmx?wsdl`。The following example specifies a binding named `RemoteBinding` that is a member of the `http://www.contoso.com/MyBinding` namespace and defined at `http://www.contoso.com/MyService.asmx?wsdl`. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic WebServiceBindingAttribute.WebServiceBindingAttribute3 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebServiceBindingAttribute.WebServiceBindingAttribute3 Example/CS/sourcecs.asmx)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic WebServiceBindingAttribute.WebServiceBindingAttribute3 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebServiceBindingAttribute.WebServiceBindingAttribute3 Example/VB/sourcevb.asmx)]

summary.span: Gets or sets the Web Services Interoperability (WSI) specification to which the binding claims to conform.

span.span: Gets or sets the Web Services Interoperability (WSI) specification to which the binding claims to conform.

value.span: 其中一个值，指示 WSI 规范。

span.span: One of the values, indicating a WSI specification.

remarks.format: ## Remarks WS-我的组织发布准则以确保跨平台的 Web 服务互操作性。The WS-I organization publishes guidelines to ensure the interoperability of Web services across platforms. 此属性指示绑定声明以符合 WSI 规范。This property indicates the WSI specification to which the binding claims to conform. 属性控制发布时 Web 服务的 WSDL 说明是否提供一致性声明。The property controls whether the conformance claims are provided when a WSDL description of the Web service is published.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool EmitConformanceClaims { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.EmitConformanceClaims : bool with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the binding emits conformance claims.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the binding emits conformance claims.

value.span: 如果绑定发出一致性声明;否则为。

span.span: if the binding emits conformance claims; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的值控制表达一致性声明发布 Web 服务的 WSDL 说明时提供属性。The value of this property controls whether the conformance claims expressed by the property are provided when a WSDL description of the Web service is published.

summary.span: Gets or sets the location where the binding is defined.

span.span: Gets or sets the location where the binding is defined.
The location where the binding is defined.

value.span: 默认值为特性应用于 XML Web 服务的 URL。

span.span: The default is the URL of the XML Web service to which the attribute is applied.

The default is http://tempuri.org/.
